name: CulliganWater
0:
”Alexa, ask Culligan Water for noodles.”
”Alexa, ask Culligan Water for bubbles.”
”Alexa, ask Culligan Water for ice cubes.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: culligan water
des:
Give your people Culligan Water and learn more about their new campaign, experience an “As You Wish” magical outcome generator. 
 
Water is central to so much of our home lives—cooking, showering, brushing our teeth and, yes, drinking it, so Culligan Water wants to make the case that even if you don’t mind drinking from the water hose, you probably would give your loved ones in your home the very best water possible.
 
Just say, “Alexa, ask Culligan Water _________” and the answer you receive will depend on what you ask for…
 
Try asking for:
Noodles, Bubbles, Ice Cubes, or the Sound of Water
Ask anything else and hear back “As You Wish”!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
